USER_WORD_VALIDATION_PHRASE_LENGTH: The phrase must contain at least two characters.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_PHRASE_NOT_EMPTY: The phrase must contain at least one character.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_SHORTCUT_CONTAINS_E: The shortcut cannot contain any Emoji.
PERIOD_SHORTCUT_DESCRIPTION:
Double tapping the space bar will
insert a period followed by a space.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_PHRASE_NOT_ALL_WHIT: The phrase cannot be all spaces.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_SHORTCUT_DUPLICATE: The shortcut cannot be the same as an existing shortcut.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_SHORTCUT_LENGTH: The shortcut must contain at least two characters.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_SHORTCUT_CONTAINS_C: The shortcut cannot contain any Chinese characters.
The shortcut cannot contain any Chinese or Japanese punctuation characters.
SPACE_CONFIRMATION_EXPLANATION: Tap the space bar to confirm the first suggestion.
USER_WORD_VALIDATION_PHRASE_DUPLICATE: The phrase cannot be the same as an existing shortcut or phrase.
USER_WORD_EXPLANATORY_TEXT:
Create a shortcut that will automatically
 expand into the word or phrase
